title: Item Sets
body: Why is it that there are still item sets within the game but we are unable to edit/delete them on the new client I believe that item sets are great for the game because they can help people to remember op sets that they used but don't really remember them. Item sets are also extremely good for coaching and helping new players to the game. Can Rito please do something about item sets and the new client.

replies.body: Don't worry, they're coming back. Apparently they're already on the PBE
